<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 13"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Ankylostar](/Equipment.aspx?ID=644)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #154: Siege of the Dinosaurs](/Sources.aspx?ID=31) pg. 75</row>

**Price** 2,800 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Morningstar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=8)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This hefty spiked club is made from the fossilized tail-club of a young ankylosaurus. It can be wielded as a _+2 greater striking [morningstar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=8)_.

<document level="2" id="action-494" />

<document level="2" id="action-495" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Ankylostar
